text:
The Latest News



March 3, 2015

DERMOT MULRONEY ADDED TO CAST OF ‘NORTHPOLE: OPEN FOR CHRISTMAS’

Hallmark Channel announces Dermot Mulroney has been added to the cast in a highly anticipated role in Northpole: Open For Christmas, a Hallmark Channel Original Movie World Premiere Holiday 2015. Mulroney co-stars alongside Lori Loughlin ("When Calls The Heart," "Garage Sale Mystery," "Full House") and Bailee Madison ("Good Witch," "Northpole") in this mesmerizing holiday adventure. Mulroney stars as Ian, a small town handyman who comes to the aid of Mackenzie, played by Loughlin, to help restore a cherished local inn she inherited, but wants to sell. Unbeknownst to Ian and Mackenzie, Santa sends his trusted elf Clementine (Madison) on a special mission to help Mackenzie rebuild and rediscover the magic of the holidays.





March 2, 2015

NORTHPOLE: OPEN FOR CHRISTMAS

Hallmark Channel, in collaboration with Hallmark Cards, Inc., announces the start of production on “Northpole: Open For Christmas,” a Hallmark Channel Original Movie World Premiere Holiday 2015. “Northpole: Open For Christmas,” starring Lori Loughlin (“When Calls The Heart,” “Garage Sale Mystery,” “Full House”) and Bailee Madison (“Good Witch,” “Northpole”), will mesmerize viewers with the magic of the Northpole and the spirit of Christmas. Loughlin stars as Mackenzie, a successful businesswoman who inherits her beloved aunt’s inn, and chooses to restore the hotel to its original grandeur only to sell it right before Christmas. Unbeknownst to Mackenzie, she receives some unexpected help from a team of elves headed by the cheerful Clementine (Madison), who helps Mackenzie rediscover the true meaning of Christmas.
